title: Commission Directive 80/511/EEC of 2 May 1980 authorizing, in certain cases, the marketing of compound feedingstuffs in unsealed packages or containers
header:
COMMISSION DIRECTIVE  of 2 May 1980  authorizing, in certain cases, the marketing of compound feedingstuffs in unsealed packages or containers  (80/511/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Member States shall bring into force the necessary laws, regulations and administrative provisions to enable them to comply with this Directive with effect from 1 January 1981 and shall forthwith inform the Commission thereof.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 May 1980.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 86, 6.4.1979, p. 30.
